author: Kendra James
title: The delicious arrogance in Netflix’s Tiger King has depressing implications for America
description: Netflix’s addictive miniseries Tiger King: Murder, Mayhem and Madness is a viral hit thanks to personalities like Carole Baskin and Joe Exotic. But it’s a reminder that assumed untouchability won’t protect people from, most recently,  the coronavirus pandemic…
content: Aside from the rare national news story like the Ohio man who set his big cats free in 2011, the public rarely gets to peek inside the wild world of exotic animal owners in America. But theyre in the spotlight again with Netflixs new docu-series, Tiger King: … [+6828 chars]
